name: Politicians Lie T-Shirt
description:
Do Politicians lie?

Only when their mouths are moving!

If you're tired of being treated like a stooge by our political representatives, then join us in calling them out on it.

You know they lie. They know they lie. They just don't think you care.

So tell the truth and show the world that you do care about the lies and corruption that have overtaken our political process.

Printed on high quality 100% cotton tees, the trendy design and truthful message will be a hit with everyone who sees you wearing it!

Available in round neck for men's sizes S-XXL and V-neck for women's sizes M-XL
